name: Cerium(III) oxide
desc: Cerium(III) oxide, also known as cerium oxide, cerium trioxide, cerium sesquioxide, cerous oxide or dicerium trioxide, is an oxide of the rare earth metal cerium. It has chemical formula Ce2O3, and is gold-yellow in color.
